attributes.action: Withdraw from Art 50 and trigger it again to win another 2 years of negotiations
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&source=web&rct=j&url=https://curia.europa.eu/jcms/upload/docs/application/pdf/2018-12/cp180191en.pdf&ved=2ahUKEwjTwoWMrv3gAhW8VBUIHb1NAmgQFjAAegQIAxAB&usg=AOvVaw3myVbcrHlc06yMF7IvEEDD

The link to the relevant CJEU Judgement.
attributes.background: The CJEU ruled that the UK can withdraw from Art 50 without the consent of the other member states. So, the UK can withdraw it and retrigger it again. This way the governement can win 2 extra years of negotiations and humiliate the EU for their hurrendous treatment to this country.
